column2: "Na ɔhen no somae ma wokehyiaa Juda na Jerusalɛm amampanyin no nyinara ma wɔbaa ne nkyɛn."
"Na ɔhen no sii mu kɔr EWURADZE fie
column3: na Juda mbarimba nyinara na Jerusalɛm atsefo nyinara ka no ho
column4: na asɔfo no
column7: nkakraba na akɛse nyina: na ɔkenkaan ahyɛmu nwoma no a wohun no wɔ EWURADZE fie no no mu nsɛm no nyinara guu hɔn asomu."

column2: "Na ɔhen no kegyinaa dum no ho
column3: na odzii ahyɛmu wɔ EWURADZE enyim
column4: dɛ ɔdze n'akoma nyinara
column10: dɛ ɔbɛma ahyɛmu yi no mu nsɛm a wɔakyerɛw no wɔ nwoma yi mu no etsim: na ɔman no nyinara gyinaa ahyɛmu no do."

column2: "Na ɔhen no hyɛɛ ɔsɔfopanyin Hilkia
column3: na asɔfo a wodzi do no
column4: na abowanoahwɛfo no
column5: dɛ wonyiyi ndzɛmba nyinara a wɔyɛe maa Baal
column8: mfi EWURADZE n'asɔrfi no mu mpue: na ɔkɛhyeew no Jerusalɛm ekyir wɔ Kidron ho haban mu
column9: na ɔfaa no ho nso no kɔr Bɛtɛl."

column2: "Na otutuu asɔfo huhuw no a Juda ahemfo hyehyɛe a wɔhyew eduhuam wɔ Juda nkurow mu
column3: mbea sorɔnsorɔm do
column4: na mbeambea a abɔ Jerusalɛm ho aprɔw no fii do; hɔn so a wɔhyew eduhuam ma Baal

column2: "Na oyii Asera no fii EWURADZE ne fie
column3: Jerusalɛm ekyir
column4: kɔr ɔwora Kidron ho
column5: na ɔhyeew no wɔ ɔwora Kidron ho
column6: na osiiw no nketsenketse dɛ huntuma
column7: na ɔkɔtoow no huntuma guu nkorɔfo mba adakamona do."

column2: "Na obubuu ndwamandan a ɔwɔ EWURADZE fie no
column3: beebi mbrɛ mbaa no ween nsensɛnho maa Asera no."

column2: "Na ɔdze asɔfo no nyinara fi Juda nkurow no mu bae
column3: na oguu mbea sorɔnsorɔm mbrɛ asɔfo no hyeew hɔ eduhuam no ho fi
column4: fi Geba kodu Beer-seba; na odwuruuw nkuropon ano mbea sorɔnsorɔm a ɔwɔ kurow no mu ambrado Josua no kuropon ahɛnee mu a ɔwɔ nyimpa n'abankum afamu mber a ɔrehɛn kurow no no kuropon no mu no."

column2: "Naaso mbea sorɔnsorɔm do asɔfo no wɔammfow ammba EWURADZE n'afɔrmbukyia no do wɔ Jerusalɛm
column3: mbom wodzii epitsi no bi wɔ hɔn nuanom mu."

column2: "Na oguu Tofet a ɔwɔ Hinommba ɔbɔn no mu no ho fi
column3: ama nyimpa bi aannhyew ne babanyin anaa ne babaa ammbɔ afɔr amma Molek bio."

column2: "Na ɔfaa mpɔnkɔ a Juda ahemfo dze esisi hɔ ama ewia no
column3: wɔ EWURADZE ne fi ahɛnee no
column4: ɔdze kɔ opianyi Natan-melek ne dan a ɔwɔ asɔrdan no nkyɛn no ho; na ɔdze gya hyeew ewia ne ntseaseanam no."

column2: "Na afɔrmbukyia a ɔwɔ Ahaz abansor dan etsifi a Juda ahemfo yɛe
column3: na afɔrmbukyia a Manaasɛ yɛe no wɔ EWURADZE ne fie aban paado ebien no do no
column4: ɔhen no dwuruuw no
column6: na ɔdze no huntuma no guu ɔwora Kidron mu."

column2: "Na mbea sorɔnsorɔm no a ɔwɔ Jerusalɛm enyim no a ɔwɔ ɔsɛɛ bepɔw no enyimfa a Israelhen Solomon sii maa Zidonfo ekyiwadze Ashtoret
column3: na Moab ekyiwadze Kemos
column4: na Ammonmba ekyiwadze Milcom no

column2: "Na obubuu edum no mu esinesin
column3: na otwitwaa Aserim no
column4: na ɔdze nyimpa mbiew hyehyɛɛ hɔn ananmu."

column2: "Nkyii so afɔrmbukyia no a ɔwɔ Bɛtɛl
column3: na bea sorɔnsorɔm no a Nebat ne ba Jeroboam a ɔmaa Israel yɛɛ bɔn no
column4: yɛe no
column5: afɔrmbukyia no na bea sorɔnsorɔm no mpo so odwuruuw no; na ɔhyeew bea sorɔnsorɔm no na ɔyaam no huntuhuntu dɛ huntuma

column2: "Na Josia daan noho no
column3: nna ohun asamandan a ɔwɔ bepɔw no mu no; na ɔsomae
column4: na wɔkɛfaa mbiew no wɔ asamandan no mu bɛhyeew no wɔ afɔrmbukyia no do
column6: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE n'asɛm a Nyame nyimpa no a ɔka nsɛm yi no paa mu kae no tse."

column2: "Nna ɔsee dɛ
column3: Ebɛn nkaabɔdze na muhu yi? Na ekuromfo no kaa kyerɛɛ no dɛ
column4: Nyame nyimpa no a ofi Juda bae
column5: na ɔbɛkaa nsɛm a edze ayɛ Bɛtɛl afɔrmbukyia yi no

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Hom mma ɔnko hɔ: mma mma nyimpa biara nnka ne mbiew. Nna wɔmaa ne mbiew
column4: na nkɔnhyɛnyi a ofi Samaria bae no ne mbiew koo hɔ."

column2: "Na mbea sorɔnsorɔm adan nyinara so a ɔwɔ Samaria nkurow mu a Israel ahemfo yeyɛɛ dɛ wɔdze riyi EWURADZE ebufuw no
column3: Josia yiyii kɔree
column4: na ɔkɛyɛɛ no dɛ mbrɛ ndzeyɛɛ a ɔyɛe no Bɛtɛl no nyinara tse."

column2: "Na okunkum mbea sorɔnsorɔm do asɔfo no a wɔwɔ hɔ no nyinara wɔ afɔrmbukyia no do
column3: na ɔhyeew nyimpa mbiew wɔ do; na ɔsanee baa Jerusalɛm."

column2: "Na ɔhen no hyɛɛ ɔman no nyinara
column3: dɛ
column4: Hom ndzi apaho no mma hom EWURADZE Nyankopɔn
column5: dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw no wɔ ahyɛmu nwoma yi mu no."

column2: "Woenndzi apaho bi a ɔtse dɛm yi da fitsi atsɛmbuafo a wobuaa Israel atsɛn no nda do
column3: na Israel ahemfo
column4: na Juda ahemfo nda nyinara mu;"

column2: "gyedɛ ɔhen Josia n'afe a otsia duawɔtwe no mu na wodzii apaho yi maa EWURADZE wɔ Jerusalɛm."
"Nkyii so hɔn a wɔyɛ asamamfrɛfo
column3: na abayifo
column4: na ekum
column6: na ekyiwadze nyinara a wohun no wɔ Juda asaase do na Jerusalɛm no
column8: ama ɔaama nsɛm a wɔakyerɛw no wɔ nwoma a ɔsɔfo Hilkia kohun no wɔ EWURADZE ne fi no mu no etsim."

column2: "Na ɔhen biara enndzi n'enyim a ɔtse dɛ ɔno a ɔdze n'akoma nyinara
column3: na ɔnye ne kra nyinara
column4: na ɔnye n'ahoɔdzen nyinara danee baa EWURADZE nkyɛn dɛ mbrɛ Moses mbra no nyinara tse; nkyii so ɔno n'ekyir obiara nnsoɛree a ɔtse dɛ ɔno."

column2: "Naaso EWURADZE anndan emmfi n'ebufuhyew kɛse a ɔdzɛwee wɔ Juda do
column3: osian abohur nyinara a Manaasɛ dze huur no bo no nyina ntsi no ho."

column2: "Na EWURADZE see dɛ
column3: Mibeyi Juda so efi m'enyi do
column4: dɛ mbrɛ meyi Israel no
column5: na matow kurow a masan mu eyi yi

column2: "Afei Josia no ho nsɛm nkaa no
column3: na dza ɔyɛe nyinara
column4: ana wɔnnkyerɛɛw no wɔ Juda ahemfo hɔn Mbermunsɛm nwoma no mu?"

column2: "Ne nda no mu na Egypthen Farao-neko sii mu kɔr Asiriahen do
column3: wɔ esutsen Eufrates ho: na ɔhen Josia sii mu kɔr no do; naaso wokum no wɔ Megiddo
column4: aber a ohun no no."

column2: "Na no nkowaa no twee no fun wɔ tseaseanam mu fii Megiddo
column3: na wɔdze no baa Jerusalɛm besiee no wɔ nankasa n'asamandan mu. Na asaase no do ɔman no faa Josia ne ba Jehoahaz seraa no
column4: na wɔhyɛɛ no hen hyɛɛ n'egya n'ananmu."

column2: "Aber a Jehoahaz hyɛɛ ase dɛ oridzi hen no na oedzi mfe eduonu ebiasa; na odzii hen abosoom ebiasa wɔ Jerusalɛm: na ne na ne dzin dze Hamutal
column3: Jeremia a ofi Libna ne babaa a."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE enyi do
column3: dɛ mbrɛ dza n'egyanom yɛe nyinara tse."

column2: "Na Farao-neko too no nkyehoma mu wɔ Ribla wɔ Hamat asaase do
column3: amma oeenndzi hen wɔ Jerusalɛm; na ɔdze dwetɛ  talent   ɔha
column4: na sika  talent   kor tow too asaase no do."

column2: "Na Farao-neko hyɛɛ Josia ne ba Eliakim hen hyɛɛ n'egya Josia n'ananmu
column3: na ɔdaan ne dzin Jehoiakim: na Jehoahaz dze
column4: ɔfaa no kɔree; na ɔbaa Egypt

column2: "Na Jehoiakim dze dwetɛ na sika no maa Farao; na ɔpaa tow maa asaase no dɛ wɔmma sika no dɛ mbrɛ Farao ne mbrasɛm no tse: ɔgyegyee dwetɛ na sika no wɔ asaase no do nkorɔfo no hɔ
column3: obiara dɛ mbrɛ no tow tse
column4: dɛ ɔdze rekɛma Farao-neko."

column2: "Aber a Jehoiakim hyɛɛ ase dɛ oridzi hen no nna oedzi mfe eduonu enum; na odzii hen mfe dubiako wɔ Jerusalɛm: na ne na ne dzin dze Zebida
column3: Pedaia a ofi Ruma ne babaa a."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE enyi do
column3: dɛ mbrɛ dza n'egyanom yɛe no nyinara tse."
